com.logiccity.minecraft.api

Interface GameInfo


  • public interface GameInfo
    The interface for retrieving player/game info

      • generateMaze

        boolean[][] generateMaze(int columns,
                         int rows)
        Generated a random 2-D maze
        Parameters:
        columns - the number of path ways in each row
        rows - the number of path ways in each column
        Returns:
        a 2-D boolean array with true as wall blocks

        Get health of a living entity
        Parameters:
        name - the name of the entity
        Returns:
        the health number or -1 if entity died or does not exist
